channel.title: procrastination on Josiah King
channel.description: Recent content in procrastination on Josiah King

item.title: 'Sometimes a scream is better than a thesis'
item.description: This is a pretty light-hearted first blog post. No doubt as time goes on, I’ll attempt to write about more useful things, but I thought I would kick things off with what basically amounts to some self-congratulatory shouting of “Look, I did a thing!”.
